name: Nyaa.si Dark
description: A dark blue style for Nyaa.si
additional_info: Works best when you don't have the dark mode on the site enabled. Release log: ---------- 2020 Mar 11 * The arrow above drop down menus now always displays under the caret in the navigation bar * Removed the CSS that hides the footer, and added styling to it ---------- 2019 Nov 16 * Fixed the symmetry of the "padding" in torrent descriptions ---------- 2019 Nov 15 * The report popup and all modal popups should now be styled ---------- 2019 Jun 3 * Fixed seeder/leecher number colors on torrent listing page ---------- 2019 Apr 14 * Minor color changes to torrent seeders and leechers * Aligned torrent information on torrent rows to the right * Bolded torrent information on torrent rows to increase visibility ---------- 2018 Oct 20 * Minor color changes to torrent types * Styling for locked comments notification ---------- * 2.1.0 * ---> Upload page mostly finished * ---> Fixes to pre and code tags * ---> Various minor fixes ---------- * 2.0.0 - 2018 July 24 * ---> Completely rewritten and redesigned for Nyaa.si ---------- * 1.2.0 - 2016 Sept 25 * ---> Profile page styled. * ---> User Settings page styled. ---------- * 1.1.0 - 2016 Sept 24 * ---> Search page is now styled. * ---> The refined search option can be viewed on hover similar to the category box. * ---> The search buttons now use the hand pointer cursor instead of the default cursor. ---------- * 1.0.4 - 2016 Sept 22 * ---> Changed the colors of the category buttons, category header, and sort buttons to better compliment the theme. * ---> Made the category header function more like a drop-down instead of expanding the entire page when hovered over. * ---> Moved the sort buttons to the right to work with the header change and to remove white space. ---------- * 1.0.1 - 2016 Sept 21 * ---> Added A+ torrent coloring (How did I miss that?) ---------- * 1.0.0 - 2016 Sept 21 * ---> Initial release ----------
